name: Fantasmize
description:
FANTASMIZE

You are a normal ghost trying to get back some of your fellow spirits to the world they (and you) really belong to. There seems to be only normal people walking on the street, but some of them might show their true ghost form! Pay attention and try to catch as many as possible.

--------INSTRUCTIONS-----------

Fantasmize is played with the keyboard [W,A,S,D], using the SPACE key for the menus.

Watch out for humans who transform into ghosts for a few seconds. 

When you crash into a ghost, you will automatically catch them.

Don't collide with humans!

--------CREDITS------------

Created by SiraGem and Titus Santana

Song: Halloween Kills Music provided by "No Coin Music Planet" Video Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Onr9hWwXxSc&ab_channel=NoCoinMusicPlanet

--------CREATED FOR SOLODEVELOPMENT'S HALLOWEEN JAM 2021-----------
